Name: Robogal
About the game: This is a role-playing game. In the game, you will play the role of bio robot maker. Through the data collection of prototype, you can customized robots for clients . Up to 7 characters can be created As many as seven characters can be created with different personalities and are used as prototypes to create robots with different characteristics. All kinds of puzzle games Solve puzzle games in the process to complete task and collecting character data by playing different games. jigsaw puzzle Pharmaceutical games Shooting games
